name: ASHES (itch) (Sharks)
description:
NOTE. MAY BE LAGGY IN BROWSER WE SUGGEST DOWNLOADING IT! Ashes is a fast paced game in which you put out fires. Use WASD and Space to move. Click to use Fire Extinguisher. The icon in the bottom right is the amount of water you have. It will deplete as you use your fire extinguisher. When you run out, go to the fire extinguisher outside to refill it. The fires are a bit finicky, but it’s possible to put them out. TIP: Try to spread the spray of the extinguisher as long as possible. 

It was made for Ludum Dare 44
